subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In 23 games with Pittsburgh before his return to New York for a weekend series with the Yankees, Ike Davis had a .286 batting average and a .797 on-base plus slugging percentage.
snippet: In 23 games with Pittsburgh before his return to New York for a weekend series with the Yankees, Ike Davis had a .286 batting average and a .797 on-base plus slugging percentage.
